I got banned for hacking in casual, but it's what I get for being a script-kiddie. Overall the game is a timeless classic that still gets updates! The Battle Royale is practically dead but everything else is fine. The community is mostly nice but there are a rare few who mic-spam, call you the n-word, or are just an overall bad player and blame it on the team. There isn't much of a skill gap as it's easy to master the controls and learn "the talk" of CS:GO.

Overall, a pretty fun game.

(I miss being unbanned)
